title: How can i fix League Of Legends crashing after champion selection?
body: After champion selection game crashes and bugsplat appears.Every time i get a leavebuster.Thank you.

replies.body: Heya, bugsplats are usually caused by driver, hardware, or even game file problems.  Run a repair to see if that helps, and use our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to check your drivers.  Test it in a custom game though so your leaverbuster doesn't escalate.
